verses.verse: So all Israel <S%H3478><s%> were reckoned by genealogies <S%H3187><s%>; and, behold, they were written <S%H3789><s%> in the book <S%H5612><s%> of the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and Judah <S%H3063><s%>, who were carried away <S%H1540><s%> to Babylon <S%H894><s%> for their transgression <S%H4604><s%>.

¶ Now the first <S%H7223><s%> inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> that dwelt in their possessions <S%H272><s%> in their cities <S%H5892><s%> were, the Israelites <S%H3478><s%>, the priests <S%H3548><s%>, Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and the Nethinims <S%H5411><s%>.

And in Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, and of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, and of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, and Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>;

Uthai <S%H5793><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ammihud <S%H5989><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Omri <S%H6018><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Imri <S%H566><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bani <S%H1137><s%>, of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Pharez <S%H6557><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>.
And of the Shilonites <S%H7888><s%>; Asaiah <S%H6222><s%> the firstborn <S%H1060><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>.
And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zerah <S%H2226><s%>; Jeuel <S%H3262><s%>, and their brethren <S%H251><s%>, six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ninety <S%H8673><s%>.

And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>; Sallu <S%H5543><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hodaviah <S%H1938><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hasenuah <S%H5574><s%>,

And Ibneiah <S%H2997><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham <S%H3395><s%>, and Elah <S%H425><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzzi <S%H5813><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Michri <S%H4381><s%>, and Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shephathiah <S%H8203><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Reuel <S%H7467><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ibnijah <S%H2998><s%>;

And their brethren <S%H251><s%>, according to their generations <S%H8435><s%>, nine <S%H8672><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%>. All these men <S%H582><s%> were chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>.
¶ And of the priests <S%H3548><s%>; Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%>, and Jehoiarib <S%H3080><s%>, and Jachin <S%H3199><s%>,

And Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hilkiah <S%H2518><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok <S%H6659><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meraioth <S%H4812><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ahitub <S%H285><s%>, the ruler <S%H5057><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>;

And Adaiah <S%H5718><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeroham <S%H3395><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pashur <S%H6583><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Malchijah <S%H4441><s%>, and Maasiai <S%H4640><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Adiel <S%H5717><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jahzerah <S%H3170><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshullam <S%H4918><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshillemith <S%H4921><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Immer <S%H564><s%>;

And their brethren <S%H251><s%>, heads <S%H7218><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, a thousand <S%H505><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and threescore <S%H8346><s%>; very able <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H1368><s%> for the work <S%H4399><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

And of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>; Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hasshub <S%H2815><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azrikam <S%H5840><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabiah <S%H2811><s%>, of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>;

And Bakbakkar <S%H1230><s%>, Heresh <S%H2792><s%>, and Galal <S%H1559><s%>, and Mattaniah <S%H4983><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Micah <S%H4316><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zichri <S%H2147><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph <S%H623><s%>;

And Obadiah <S%H5662><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Galal <S%H1559><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeduthun <S%H3038><s%>, and Berechiah <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Asa <S%H609><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Elkanah <S%H511><s%>, that dwelt <S%H3427><s%> in the villages <S%H2691><s%> of the Netophathites <S%H5200><s%>.

And the porters <S%H7778><s%> were, Shallum <S%H7967><s%>, and Akkub <S%H6126><s%>, and Talmon <S%H2929><s%>, and Ahiman <S%H289><s%>, and their brethren <S%H251><s%>: Shallum <S%H7967><s%> was the chief <S%H7218><s%>;

Who hitherto waited in the king's <S%H4428><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%>: they were porters <S%H7778><s%> in the companies <S%H4264><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>.

And Shallum <S%H7967><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Kore <S%H6981><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Ebiasaph <S%H43><s%>, the son <S%H1121><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>, and his brethren <S%H251><s%>, of the house <S%H1004><s%> of his father <S%H1><s%>, the Korahites <S%H7145><s%>, were over the work <S%H4399><s%> of the service <S%H5656><s%>, keepers <S%H8104><s%> of the gates <S%H5592><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>: and their fathers <S%H1><s%>, being over the host <S%H4264><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, were keepers <S%H8104><s%> of the entry <S%H3996><s%>.
And Phinehas <S%H6372><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> was the ruler <S%H5057><s%> over them in time past <S%H6440><s%>, and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> was with him.
And Zechariah <S%H2148><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshelemiah <S%H4920><s%> was porter <S%H7778><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

All these which were chosen <S%H1305><s%> to be porters <S%H7778><s%> in the gates <S%H5592><s%> were two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and twelve <S%H8147><s%> <S%H6240><s%>. These were reckoned by their genealogy <S%H3187><s%> in their villages <S%H2691><s%>, whom <S%H1992><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> and Samuel <S%H8050><s%> the seer <S%H7200><s%> did ordain <S%H3245><s%> in their set office <S%H530><s%>.

So they and their children <S%H1121><s%> had the oversight of the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, namely, the house <S%H1004><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, by wards <S%H4931><s%>.
In four <S%H702><s%> quarters <S%H7307><s%> were the porters <S%H7778><s%>, toward the east <S%H4217><s%>, west <S%H3220><s%>, north <S%H6828><s%>, and south <S%H5045><s%>.

And their brethren <S%H251><s%>, which were in their villages <S%H2691><s%>, were to come <S%H935><s%> after seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> from time <S%H6256><s%> to time <S%H6256><s%> with them.

For these Levites <S%H3881><s%>, the four <S%H702><s%> chief <S%H1368><s%> porters <S%H7778><s%>, were in their set office <S%H530><s%>, and were over the chambers <S%H3957><s%> and treasuries <S%H214><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

¶ And they lodged <S%H3885><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, because the charge <S%H4931><s%> was upon them, and the opening <S%H4668><s%> thereof every morning <S%H1242><s%> pertained to them.

And certain of them had the charge of <S%H5921><s%> the ministering <S%H5656><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%>, that they should bring them in <S%H935><s%> and out <S%H3318><s%> by tale <S%H4557><s%> <S%H4557><s%>.

Some of them also were appointed <S%H4487><s%> to oversee the vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and all the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and the fine flour <S%H5560><s%>, and the wine <S%H3196><s%>, and the oil <S%H8081><s%>, and the frankincense <S%H3828><s%>, and the spices <S%H1314><s%>.
And some of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> made <S%H7543><s%> the ointment <S%H4842><s%> of the spices <S%H1314><s%>.

And Mattithiah <S%H4993><s%>, one of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, who was the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of Shallum <S%H7967><s%> the Korahite <S%H7145><s%>, had the set office <S%H530><s%> over the things that were made <S%H4639><s%> in the pans <S%H2281><s%>.

And other of their brethren <S%H251><s%>, of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%>, were over the shewbread <S%H3899><s%> <S%H4635><s%>, to prepare <S%H3559><s%> it every sabbath <S%H7676><s%>.

And these are the singers <S%H7891><s%>, chief <S%H7218><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, who remaining in the chambers <S%H3957><s%> were free <S%H6362><s%> <S%H6359><s%>: for they were employed in that work <S%H4399><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> and night <S%H3915><s%>.
These chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> were chief <S%H7218><s%> throughout their generations <S%H8435><s%>; these dwelt <S%H3427><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

¶ And in Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> the father <S%H1><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> <S%H25><s%>, Jehiel <S%H3273><s%>, whose wife's <S%H802><s%> name <S%H8034><s%> was Maachah <S%H4601><s%>:
And his firstborn <S%H1060><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> Abdon <S%H5658><s%>, then Zur <S%H6698><s%>, and Kish <S%H7027><s%>, and Baal <S%H1168><s%>, and Ner <S%H5369><s%>, and Nadab <S%H5070><s%>,
And Gedor <S%H1446><s%>, and Ahio <S%H283><s%>, and Zechariah <S%H2148><s%>, and Mikloth <S%H4732><s%>.

And Mikloth <S%H4732><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Shimeam <S%H8043><s%>. And they also dwelt <S%H3427><s%> with their brethren <S%H251><s%> at Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>, over against their brethren <S%H251><s%>.

And Ner <S%H5369><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Kish <S%H7027><s%>; and Kish <S%H7027><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Saul <S%H7586><s%>; and Saul <S%H7586><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jonathan <S%H3083><s%>, and Malchi-shua <S%H4444><s%>, and Abinadab <S%H41><s%>, and Esh-baal <S%H792><s%>.
And the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jonathan <S%H3083><s%> was Merib-baal <S%H4807><s%>: and Merib-baal <S%H4810><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Micah <S%H4318><s%>.
And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Micah <S%H4318><s%> were, Pithon <S%H6377><s%>, and Melech <S%H4429><s%>, and Tahrea <S%H8475><s%>, and Ahaz.

And Ahaz <S%H271><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Jarah <S%H3294><s%>; and Jarah <S%H3294><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Alemeth <S%H5964><s%>, and Azmaveth <S%H5820><s%>, and Zimri <S%H2174><s%>; and Zimri <S%H2174><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Moza <S%H4162><s%>;
And Moza <S%H4162><s%> begat <S%H3205><s%> Binea <S%H1150><s%>; and Rephaiah <S%H7509><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Eleasah <S%H501><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, Azel <S%H682><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>.

And Azel <S%H682><s%> had six <S%H8337><s%> sons <S%H1121><s%>, whose names <S%H8034><s%> are these, Azrikam <S%H5840><s%>, Bocheru <S%H1074><s%>, and Ishmael <S%H3458><s%>, and Sheariah <S%H8187><s%>, and Obadiah <S%H5662><s%>, and Hanan <S%H2605><s%>: these were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azel <S%H682><s%>.
